scope.title: AgDS Beta v1.23.0 release
scope.description: Add sub-level support to App layout sidebar, new UX for Side nav sub-levels, add theming to Main nav and Footer, allow co-branding App layout header, plus various bug fixes and improvements.

data.title: AgDS Beta v1.23.0 release
data.description: Add sub-level support to App layout sidebar, new UX for Side nav sub-levels, add theming to Main nav and Footer, allow co-branding App layout header, plus various bug fixes and improvements.
